paragraph: Amanda Linnea Fondell (born 29 August 1994, Linder√∂d, Sweden) is a Swedish singer and winner of the eighth series of Swedish Idol, which she won on 9 December 2011 with 52% of the votes. Fondell's first single "All This Way" was released on 2 December 2011. The song was written and produced by Idol 2004 runner up Darin Zanyar, amongst others.
